prompt: A team of mid-career to senior professionals (ages 35-55, diverse in gender and ethnicity) engaged in a focused, strategic conversation in a premium, warmly lit modern office. The environment features natural materials like wood and plants, with rich textures and natural light streaming in. The professionals are dressed in smart business attire, caught mid-gesture or listening with attentive concentration. The composition uses a medium-wide, eye-level perspective, with generous negative space and layered depth, evoking confidence, collaborative warmth, and decisive action. Violet and amber undertones subtly infuse the scene, with soft, directional lighting and a sophisticated, editorial color grade. No visible technology, screens, or text.
